page.title: 20Fashions Emigrating
page.content: Our school uniform is red and grey and our Mums chose what suits us best. At home we like to wear our fashionable clothes like jump suits, tight jeans and baggy T.- shirts. Flared trousers are out. It is fun to have florescent jumpers, gloves and socks.{ { {Claire Compton writes: }My Dad is an air-conditioning engineer. He cannot find a job here so he has gone to find work and a house in Australia where it is hotter. We hope our house will have a swimming pool and that we shall soon make lots of new friends at school. We shall miss our Island friends. Mummy will miss the long English evening and Daddy will miss going to Portsmouth to watch the football. My brother Matthew will miss the garden especially having snow in the winter. I shall miss going for walks in our lovely countryside.
